11.content:
Probably the oddest day of your life, and it has yet to get to hit the crescendo. About mid-day Friday your best friend John started passing you notes, reminding you that you should come over to his house after school mixed in with the usual jokes and drawing of the teacher doing weird things. Despite your best efforts you can't get him to tell you what he has planned and it has made you slightly paranoid, After thinking it over during lunch you have decided its worth looking into. Only five minuets of class left and you two can get out of here, Of course John has passed you another note with another reminder. You write back that you would be happy to come over and you pass the note back. When the bell finally rang you followed him out of the room asking the same questions about what he wanted, only to be given an off centered comment

"I can't tell you here, its a secret I have wanted to tell you about it for some time but I feel I can trust you now." Pausing for a moment you register many thoughts about what he could be hiding, You just know that its going to be good. It only took seven minuets to get to his house because he lived close by and as soon as you entered his house he began talking as he lead you to his room. "Now I know that you are a trustworthy friend and all, but this is something that I haven't told anyone else. My parents are the only ones that know about it, and if you tell anyone I'll have to spill some of your secrets in return" Stopping right out side of his door grabbing the handle he turned around and looked at you "I mean it, I'll even let your parents know about all the things you did in The Fourth Grade."

He was obviously serious, his face frozen in a scowl. You wanted to keep a lot of things secret, but what you did in fourth grade dwarfs in comparison to your entire life's worth of tricks and pranks. "OK, OK! I wont tell a soul, cross my heart and hope to die." If he spilled that stuff your life would be ruined and you knew it!.

Twisting the knob and throwing the door open he motioned you to go in, You had been in here before but not under such tension. Locking the door behind him you were a little shocked, he had never locked his door before not even when he showed you those illegal fireworks he bought last summer. You sat down on his bed, waiting to hear the news he sat down next to you and told you that he wore Diapers. Maybe it was a clog in your brain or an rejection of what he had just said but you almost failed to believe him, You had seen him go into the bathroom many times during school. Silence was heavy and he would probably have been nervous if he didn't have so much dirt on you, Finally thinking of a response you make a joking comment

"OK so lets say your telling the truth..." still a lack of belief in your head "Why would you tell me something that private?"

"I am telling the truth, I'm telling you because its hard to keep a secret that is big part of my life, I feel like I'm bottling up my life, Like I can't ever be honest with you and you have been a really good friend to me sharing all of your secrets." Almost crying about it John swallowed hard, like a gallon of spit had gathered in his mouth.

You couldn't help but be overwhelmed with curiosity.. "weeeeelllllllll..... how do they feel?" the question poking at your imagination with great ferocity. The redness on his face had started to fade, maybe telling you hadn't been such a bad thing on his end.

"You want to try one?" He asked, His guilt almost instantly lifted

Pondering the aspect of wearing a diaper your mind started racing, your blood pressure rising slowly. "Ummm well.. I... uh"

Interrupting your stammering john got up from the bed "They are really comfortable and I'll let you keep it if you want" While the old saying 'nothing ventured nothing gained' was probably a valued response but you reply with a simple yes. Running over to his closet and pulling out a big bag, A bag that you had seen a few times but paid no attention to. Unzipping it you could see him pulling out a few bottles of skin creams, talcum powder, a roll of tape, and the diaper you were about to wear.

"Lay down over here" he said pointing at two tables one lower than the other by at least an inch and they were spaced about an inch apart. Laying down across the two tables because they were too small for you to fit across one your butt hung out over the lower table, you had to spread your feet apart and lift yourself up with your legs to make yourself comfortable. watching john come over and set the stuff down near you, he picked up a book and handed it to you. "Here take a look at this book while I get you set up. He used the word 'set up' in place of 'diapered' like we was aware that you were doing this on his recommendation alone and it was true. Opening the book you noticed that it was filled with pictures, half of them were really interesting to look at.

Although you never broke away from reading you could still feel him pulling down your pants and sliding your underwear off, lifting your feet when needed. You were naked from your waist down, leaving a slight breeze. He repositioned your legs in a way that elevated your posterior, rubbing at least four different lotions on your skin before dashing you with talcum powder. Flipping over to the Fifth page on the book you sneaking a peak, he was unfolding the diaper the white of the inside being the only thing you could see. Resuming your book reading right as he went to slide it under you, Pulling the diaper over your crotch you could feel the puffiness of it press against your skin. Securing the Diaper tightly on your body you almost stopped reading and got up until john said

"Hold on a minuet I'm almost done"

Relaxing your back you fell back down to the table, you could hear tape being ripped off of its roll. The space between the tables must have been intentional because it helped john run the roll around your pelvis a few times. John lifted your legs to pull your pants back on dragging them up with ease, Tieing up the belt and zipping your pants closed john shouted "OK I'm done!".

Putting the book down and sitting up you could feel the diapers padding press against you as your weight shifted onto it. Your legs spread apart by the middle section.

"Well do you like it?" john said enthusiastically.
You stood up touching the front of your pants, felling the diaper up, enjoying the feeling. "I think I like it."
"OH I knew you would, Ive been wearing them for several years now and never regretted it."
"Well what do I do now?"
"You want to ask your mom if you can stay over and play some video games?" John remarked breaking from the subject at hand.

The fact that you were wearing a diaper faded away, some games would be cool and it was Friday. "Oh hey yea I'll go call her right now, choose a game while I call her." You unlocked the door and ran out towards the phone dialing your house phone, your mom picking up a few seconds later. After talking for a few minuets your mom gave you the OK and you returned to johns room.

The afternoon was filled with lots of games and plenty of soda, you had completely forgot about the diaper even though it had a loud crinkle and spaced your legs apart bludging through your pants. After about four hours your mom had called wanting you to come home John's parents telling you that you had to go. After saying goodbye you slipped out the door still unaware of the diaper. About half way to your house you felt the need to pee, suddenly remembering that your wearing a diaper you feel slightly panicked.

'I'm Gonna have to get this thing of when I get home' you think to yourself Picking up the pace so you can make it home in time to pee. You really had to go by the time you made it to the door, you rushed past your mom towards the bathroom. Locking the door behind you because you didnt want your parents to come in. Pulling down your pants you find a lilac diaper with pink tape wrapped around your waist. You try pulling the diaper down, the tape holding it on you. you try pulling the tape off next, unable to find a place to start peeling it off. Maybe you can just pee around it, trying to lift open the side you find the an air tight seal. The pressure in your bladder was building your not going to be able to hold it much longer. Trying to peel the tape off again you still can't manage to find a place where it will peel. 'MAYBE THERE ARE SOME SCISSORS IN HERE!!!!!!!' you think more and more desperatly, searching all of the drawrs you come up empty handed. You hear water running through the pipes in the wall... mom must be doing the dishes. The sound of rushing water is making you loose concentration, You grab at the diaper, trying to tear it off. The diaper just streaching in your hands.

You start to pee, urine leaking past your spinkter, you cross your legs in an attempt to hold it in but its not helping at all. Not able to hold it back warm pee starts running into the padding, filling up the diaper and spreading your legs apart. After two minuets you stop leaking the bulk between your legs so big you cant even close your legs. You have to get this off, You know that there are sissors downstairs in the craft room... you just have to get down there. Pulling on your pants you get ready to sneak down stairs. Your pants were buldging, and you had a big enough waddle to keep you from running. Slowly opening the door you peek around the corner, mom was still doing dishes you could hear her putting some away. You walk down the hall just around the corner looking into the kitchen. Taking a quick glance around the corner you see that mom is not looking. You decide to make an run for the stairs, if you could run... Right before you reach the stairs you hear the sink stop.

You start to decend down the stairs....

11111.content:
Your mom had been away for a while, you don't know where she went but she returned with a large brown bag. Heading into your room you could hear the ruffling of the paper bag being placed on your bed. You started to waddle over to your room still having difficulty walking in a still full diaper. Entering the room you instantly spot a package of diapers and a few bottles of various lotions, powders and one that was labeled 'suppository' . Turning around and looking at you, your mom addresses your perfect timing patting the bed to suggest you should come over.

You try stepping away only to to be intercepted by your dad. Struggling in his grip you are soon pinned down onto the bed your mom taking off your clothes and cutting the diaper off and throwing it away in your trash can. The air was cool against your moist skin, the movements of your mothers arms blowing enough wind to strike you like an ocean breeze. The smell that came from the diaper filled your nostrils to the brim, the lingering smell of urine dressing the room. Wiping you down with a few cloths you began to feel dry again only to be re-moisturized with some lotion. Kicking your feet around in an attempt to break free you find that it does little to help as your mom gets on the bed and sits between them, keeping you from moving wildly. After a minute of smooth lotion-ing and dusty powders you peek past your dads arms, your mom was opening the bottle labeled 'suppository'. She had put on a pair of gloves and pulled a few bullet shaped globs of jell out of the bottle, shoving all of them into your butt. she begins reaching for the package of diapers you begin to squirm, your legs and arms tiring from resisting you begin to cry a little as the situation seems to be lost. You watch as your mother rips the packaging apart pulling out a diaper and unfolding it near you. Lifting your pelvis and placing it under you, your hopeless squirming doing nothing to prevent its placement.

The padding touched your skin, air rushing out of the puffy diaper as your weight came upon it, the front coming up over your crotch made you scream as the tabs were taped into place and secured. Throwing your head back in defeat your eyes begin to pour as your mom gets up and pulls another object out of the bag. Hearing the rustling you look back up, your tears partially blocking the view in your left eye. A pair of plastic panties were being slid past your legs, they became taught as they came around you, they were just the right size to comfort your structure. You were finished, or so you thought... You watched as your mom pulled on two lengths of chair that were coming out of the diaper, the waist tightening around you. She had a pad-a-lock in her other hand, opening it with a key and wiring the lock through you watched as she closed it shut, placing the key into her bra and checking to see if she could get a finger under it, the elastic and metal only letting her nails in. A job well done your father unpinned you, your parents standing back as you lay there your body clothed only by a diaper and locking plastic pants.

You sit up and glance down at your new attire to see.

1111112.content:
You are shocked at how easily you messed yourself. Within seconds, you can begin to smell the foul stench that emanates from your diaper; not to mention, the feel of your own waste against your skin. You groan in disgust as you stop watching TV and seek out your mom.

Your mother was in the kitchen the making dinner when you entered.

"Mom," You begin slowly, "Can you please change me?"

"I don't think I heard you correctly," Your mother replies, not even turning to look at you.

"I messed my diaper and need a change," You admit.

"Nope, try again sweetie," Your mother laughs. "Say it like a baby."

You sigh dejectedly. Your mother is having too much fun at your expense.

"Mommy, can you please change my diaper?" You beg, adding a lisp to your words.

"I'm sorry sweetie, but I'm in the middle of cooking dinner. Maybe after dinner I'll be able to change you."

Your eyes widened. The prospect of not being changed had never occurred to you. Now, you're standing in the middle of the kitchen in your gross, disgusting, used diaper with no prospect of being changed anytime soon. It seems you have several choices.

111112.content:
You were wearing a pink diaper with "My Little Pony" characters placed all over it. the plastic pants where a transparent blue, which made some of the colors look like a shiny lavender. Your crying interrupted by your mothers speech as she pulled all of your underwear out of your drawers and put the diapers in their place.

"Here are the rules:
1. No complaining or backtalk.
2. You are not allowed into the bathroom unless its for a bath that me or your father will give you.
3. You not allowed to dress yourself.
4. You are not allowed to stay up past seven
5. Do not hide your diapers from your friends or we will send you to school wearing them.

If you disobey any if these rules we will progressively add more rules and extend your punishment time."

"But!!!" you cry out
"Oh we are already up to two weeks I see"
"What!?" you shout back
"Three, if I hear one more outburst I take away your school privileges right her right now" you mother blurts.

Your hand slapped over your mouth faster than you knew you had moved it, At the very least you were not being sent to school in them. You would just die if you had to wear these to school!.

"Good boy, now I want to see you at the dinner table in five minuets." she finished, storming out of your room with the brown bag in her hand, a clacking sound coming from the bags sudden movement.

Your dad had left right behind her, leaving you on your bed your face covered in tears. You decide to get up and go to dinner, you reach into your drawer to grab a pair of pants and shirt. 'OH WAIT!!' you think. "I can't dress myself." you whisper to yourself. But.... you don't want to be naked! but it would break a rule and you would have to wear these monstrosity's to school.

You close the drawer and almost start to cry a second time, this is just horrible. You start to walk out, you stop at your door way, peeking left and right to check for eye's. Nobody was in sight so you walked down the hall into the dinning room. Just as you entered you saw your father in the room, setting up a high chair he got from the closet. You tried turning away only to have your father grab your hand "Hold on there champ, your just in time." he noted picking you up and placing you in the chair. the diaper let a burst of air out as he was sat in the chair, at first it was like a normal chat but his dad grabbed a big plastic 'T' that went between the legs. This was probably to keep babies from slipping out but it just kept you from closing your legs or getting up, you were big enough for it to pin your legs down comfortably. The sides of it clicked loudly, it locked into place keeping it from moving. Your father a few moments later put the table piece in it too clicked into place, your size again was a problem as it just pinned you back into the chair, if your arms had been under it they would have been stuck in pace as well. It was like a nightmare being pinned in here you tried reaching for the released but could not even touch them. You sat there for a few minuets, wiggling int he chair your diaper just seemed to press up against everything letting you know that it was there each movement warranting a crinkle. Your mom had walked in with two plates of dinner, setting them down on your parents side of the table. The plates contained some mashed potato's with some mac and cheese and a serving of vegetables, not that you were particularly excited about the vegetables.

Walking out of the room to go get your food she returned a moment later with.....
111112.title: a diaper with ponies

1111121.content:
You breathe a sigh of relief as your mother places your plate in front of you. Your relief is short lived as you realize that you don't have any utensils. Your mother came up behind you and tied a bib around your neck. The bib was covered in pictures of ponies to match your diapers.

"Babies don't know how to use forks or knives," Your mother explains. "I'll feed you in a minute."

You opened your mouth to protest but quickly remembered your parents' rules. You crossed your arms and pouted. As you sat staring at your food your parents began to eat their meal. A loud rumbling came from your stomach. An idea then entered your head, you could just use your hands.

You reached down and grabbed a handful of mashed potatoes and lifted it up to your mouth. The potatoes were hotter than they appeared and you ended up making more of a mess than you had anticipated. This went on for several more handfuls. Your parents had noticed, but decided not to stop you. By the time that you were finished eating your mouth was covered with cheese and potatoes, and there was a sloppy mess on your bib.

Your mother returned with a rag and wiped your mouth and hands. Then, she removed your bib. At first you thought she was angry with you, but her face wore a smile. It seemed that she was enjoying having a baby again. She then unlocked the high chair and placed you on the floor.

"You behave while I clean up dinner," Your mother said. "After I'm done cleaning up I'll give you a bath."

You stood up to leave the kitchen but collapsed back onto the floor. Your legs had been constricted while eating dinner and had both fallen asleep. With what little dignity remained, you crawled out of the kitchen. As you crawled back to your room you felt a growing pressure on your stomach.

You shook your head in defeat. You had already wet a diaper once that day, you might as well wet yourself again and get it over with. After all, you were going to be in diapers for three full weeks. As long as you weren't forced to wear diapers to school, you could always do your business there.

Within minutes you had soaked your diaper. The warmth of your diaper made you feel uneasy. This was your life for the next three weeks. Another idea popped into your head. If your parents are going to treat you like a baby, then maybe they should get the full-time. Babies throw tantrums. Babies wake up parents in the middle of the night in order to be changed. Babies are an inconvenience.

You ponder your options as you sit in your wet diaper. On the other hand, if you annoy your parents too much then they'll probably just find ways to make your punishment worse.

And then you remember; you don't! You sit up in your crib and squee. It's summer vacation! No school for three whole months!

It wasn't normal, so there was s thrill to it. As a plus, you didn't have to get up to use the bathroom when doing homework or playing games. Acting like a baby felt so uplifting as if you were free. drinking from bottles, playing with old toys... it was so hard to explain, but you had come to love it.

And then of course there's what it had done to your family. Mom had loved the idea from the get go, you clearly remember. She seemed to want to pamper and spoil you like a baby. Your dad had thought it odd at first, but he enjoyed taking care of you just as much. Your brother was accepting in playing with you and liked to pretend you were a younger brother. You stifle a burp and pull up you diaper so it's covering more of your belly. "Yes, mommy?"

"Were you serious when you said you wanted to be diapered all the time?" your mom said, sounding a bit hopeful in fact.

You think about what you had said earlier. You did say you wanted to wear diapers 24/7. That would mean going outside in diapers.

Up until now he had always made up an excuse, but now that you knew his secret he was okay with sleeping over. Needless to say he was slightly shocked when you showed him your diapers. And even more so when you showed him the nursery… but if anything it strengthened your friendship, and you both played baby whenever he was at your house. Your parents had really gone all out. Your brother was at first a little weirded out, but he came around. After all he got a room to himself for the first time, since you basically moved into the nursery. It took about three weeks to finish. First your Dad had re painted it baby blue. Then the furniture started arriving. First thing to go in was your changing table, then your crib. The last piece of furniture was the only non-baby oriented item, namely your desk and computer, though your mom had a cover with baby motifs placed on the monitor. You didn’t sell any of your regular clothes since you still needed them for school, but your nursery closet was full of your big baby clothes.

Your baby wardrobe consisted of shortalls with snap crotches, and short shirts that barely covered half your growing belly. Your pajamas consisted of onesies, and footed sleepers, though sometimes you slept in just your diaper. Your parents had moved the Xbox into the Nursery, but had left the Wii in your brother’s room. She quickly goes to her room, sit in front of her computer and easily find a website for diapers of all kinds and sizes. She goes to the boys section and searches for the most babyish one.

Finally she finds a box of 12 diapers in bright blue with little green aliens and spaceships as wetness-indicators. The price is a little bit high, because they are not only very cute, but also very thick.

“Well, he won’t be able to hide them very well, which will make him look even cuter if he tries.” Casey thinks and put them into the virtual shopping-cart.

A second before she clicks the BUY-button she see an advertisement for adult sized pacifiers and hesitates.

Casey clicks on the link to pacifiers. Several clicks later and the pacifiers have been added to the cart. Casey hovered over the buy button; again, she paused. If she was going to buy diapers and a pacifier then she might as well buy a few more items to save money on shipping costs.
Several minutes later, Casey had added a full set of shortalls, adult sized onesies, mittens, footy pajamas, bibs, baby bottles, a medium sized teddy bear, a paci clip, a changing matt, and a pair of velcro shoes to her cart. Then, Casey clicked buy. She had spent more than she had expected, just over two hundred dollars, but it was for her little brother, so it was all worth it. Besides, she was really getting into the idea of babying you. She hadn’t told you that she already knew all about your kind of desires, that she was a “Caregiver”, a “Mommy”, and looked forward to having a Little of her own to care for, even though you were her brother. She went to bed smiling as she pictured how cute you would look in your new diapers, slightly chubby belly pooching over the diaper’s waistband. How happy you would be as she fed you from your bottle, and how happy she would be doing it.

You on the other hand, were back in your room. You were tossing and turning in your bed. There were quite a few thoughts racing through your head. The thought of you wearing diapers made you excited. You couldn’t understand how this had all started, why your sister was so understanding, and that in a few days you would be wearing thick diapers again. Would your sister diaper you like a real baby? Or would she change her mind and tell your parents after all. Exhausted, you finally fall asleep, your thoughts chasing each round and round in your dreams.

The next couple days pass in extreme anticipation for both of you as you wait for the packages to arrive. Casey had timed it just right so that the packages wouldn't arrive until after school had ended, and your parents would be at work. Finally the day came and...
1133112112.title: A Bouncing Baby Boy

11331121121.content:
Every night since your talk with Casey you had dreamed about diapers. In your dreams you found yourself in all sorts of scenarios; from being pushed around in a stroller at Disneyworld to having your bedroom turned into a giant nursery. You had even imagined the cheerleaders at your school taking turns babysitting you.

Your mother and father left at their usual time to go to work. Soon, you found yourself waiting in the living room for the deliveryman to drop off the package that Casey ordered. Twenty minutes after your parents had left you heard the doorbell ring. Standing in the doorway was the deliveryman with a large box. Casey signed for the package before carrying it inside.

Once inside, Casey tore open the box and dumped out its contents. There were diapers, clothing, pacifiers, bottles, and all sorts of baby items sized for your body. While Casey looked over the receipt you looked over all of the items that she ordered and gasped. You felt thankful that your sister cared so much about you that she would buy you all of these items.

"All right squirt, it's time to get you diapered," Casey ordered. "We've only got a few hours until mom and dad get home and I know you're itching to live out your fantasy."

Casey helped remove your clothes. She spread a changing mat out on the floor of the living room. You laid on the mat and waited. You smiled as you felt Casey rubbing powder onto your lower half. Soon, you found yourself snugly taped into a diaper. A wave of happiness rolled through your body. Standing up, Casey helped dress you in a pair of shortalls with a t-shirt that had pictures of dinosaurs.

"You sit here and watch cartoons while I go hide the rest of this stuff in my room," Casey said as she placed a pacifier in your mouth.

You sat on the sofa sucking on your pacifier and watching cartoons. Most of the morning cartoons were geared towards younger children, but you were okay with that. It felt like you were a real toddler. You had become so engrossed in your show that you didn't hear the front door open.

Your mother and father entered the house, each holding a cup of coffee. They entered the living room and gasped. Your froze in terror as you looked up at your parents; without thinking, you wet your diaper in fear.

Casey raced downstairs and into the living room to see the scene. Your entire family was now in the living room and speechless. Your mother and father stared at you and then up at Casey. Casey tried to stammer out a response, but nothing intelligible came out of her mouth. After several minutes, your mother and father left the living room to talk privately in their bedroom.

You began to cry quietly as Casey sat down on the sofa next to you. She ran her hands through your hair before giving you a hug; all while quietly apologizing to you. Neither of you expected to get caught.

After what seemed like an eternity, your parents returned from their bedroom.

"Mom, please, I can explain," Casey blurted out. "This was all my idea. I talked Daniel into this."

"We both decided to take the day off today because we wanted to surprise you," Your mother explained. "Unfortunately, it turns out that you have surprised us instead. We can't have a simple coffee date without you two getting into some kind of mischief."

"What your mother is trying to say," Your father interrupted, "Is that we were planning on taking a trip to Disneyworld. We figure that this would be the last family vacation that we could have before Casey gets too wrapped up in her university responsibilities."

You looked sheepishly at the floor.

"Now, we have a choice to make," Your mother added. "We can either go to Disneyworld together, as a family, or we can stay home for the summer and help you live out this little fantasy of yours."

You glanced over at Casey looking for support. Casey appeared to be as embarrassed as you.

"There are some stipulations though," Your father said. "Since you apparently want to dress as a baby, then if we go to Disneyworld you will be dressed and treated as if you were a baby. The same goes for you Casey, since this was apparently your idea; however, you will at least be treated like a toddler."

"If you decide that you want to skip this vacation then we can order a reality modifier off the internet," Your mother added. "This way, we can alter reality to regress you to babyhood. Again, Casey, you'll be punished as well, and you'll be regressed back to being a toddler. Think it over, and let us know by dinner."

Your parents left the living room and you were left alone with Casey and your wet diaper. The two of you exchanged nervous glances. Neither option sounded appealing. You wanted to wear diapers and be treated like a baby, but you didn't want to be seen in public or physically become a baby. You also felt bad for Casey being punished.
11331121121.title: Parents find out

113311211211.content:
"I can't believe we agreed to this," Casey muttered as she sat in the hotel room waiting for your parents to finish getting ready.

Everything about Casey's outfit screamed toddler. Her shoes had velcro, her skirt was puffy, her t-shirt had a picture of princesses, and her hair was pulled into two identical pigtails. Worst of all, underneath her skirt she wore a pull-up covered in the same princesses as her shirt.

"At least you look somewhat normal," You muttered from behind your pacifier.

Your parents had found the stash of baby items Casey had ordered, and they took the liberty of ordering more. Thankfully, your parents didn't want to be hassled by airport security so you weren't diapered until you arrived at the hotel.

You sat on the bed next to Casey. You were wearing the same shortalls you had worn when you were caught. You also wore a Mickey Mouse t-shirt. The bulky diaper you were wearing kept you from walking normally. You didn't want to think about getting a diaper change inside of the park.

Soon, your parents were dressed and ready to go. Your mother took your hand and led you out of the room. Casey sullenly followed behind. Your father locked the door behind everyone. You stared at the ground as you could feel the gaze of onlookers as you made your way to the bus.

"Once we get to the park we'll get you a stroller," Your mother said as you boarded the bus.

Your mother was carrying an over-sized diaper bag filled with extra diapers for you and pull-ups for Casey. Most of the other passengers on the bus were too excited about their own trips to pay you much mind; however, you were certain that there were several children that were pointing and laughing at you.

"Which park are we visiting today?" Casey asked, trying to hide her embarrassment.
113311211211.title: Go to Disneyworld

choices: You throw a coin in the wishing well
Your parents throw a coin in the wishing well
1133112112111.content:
"The Magic Kingdom," Your mother replied.

You and Casey groaned. As much as you loved the Magic Kingdom, you had no desire to be dressed and treated as a baby while you were there.

Once inside the park, your mother kept watch on you and Casey while your father rented a stroller. From that moment onward, you were strapped into the stroller and pushed around the park. As the day went on, you could tell that your parents were getting tired of pushing you around. It was clear that they had not entirely thought their plan out.

You smiled behind your pacifier. Deep down, you were really enjoying yourself. Even though you had wet yourself several times throughout the day, it was nice to sit back and let someone else take care of your vacation. You got to meet Rapunzel and Cinderella, and they treated you like a real baby, and Casey like a real toddler. You were embarrassed, but played along. Casey, on the other hand, was close to throwing a tantrum, much like a real toddler.

As your father pushed you along you relaxed and wet your diaper. You could feel your diaper growing warm as you still maintained some semblance of your potty training. You would never admit it, but this was probably the best vacation that you had ever had.

Your parents stopped by Cinderella's wishing well to check out the guide map. They seemed to be arguing about where to go next.
1133112112111.title: "The Magic Kingdom," Your mother replied.

choices: You and Casey had phsyically changed into a baby and toddler
You had become a girl and were dressed like a princess
11331121121112.content:
Your father started to push your stroller away from the wishing well as Casey plodded along after him. Your mother stayed behind and fished a coin out of her purse. She made a silent wish before tossing the coin into the well.

The rest of the day was uneventful. By the time the fireworks ended you were nearly falling asleep. When you arrived back at the resort you could tell that something was amiss. Your mother changed your wet diaper before dressing you in your pajamas. Casey groaned as she was changed into her rather childish pajamas.

In the morning you found...
11331121121112.title: Your parents throw a coin in the wishing well

choices: You're the baby. Casey is the Toddler.
Your the toddler. Casey is the baby.
Wish malfunction. You're both babies/ Wish malfuntion. Back in Mama's tummy.
113311211211121.content: They wish for one of you to be a baby age, and one of you to be a toddler age. But which one of you gets to become the baby, and which one gets to become the toddler?
113311211211121.title: Baby And Toddler

choices: You're both adorable little babies for Mommy and Daddy to spoil.
Trapped in Mommy's tummy. Well, things just got a bit crowded.
You wake up in your room. All of it was a dream. But you're still diapered.
You wake up in your room. Just a dream. But you wet the bed in your undies.
1133112112111214.content: So, it would appear since your parents were not specific about which one of you is the baby and which on is the toddler for the wish, the wish malfunctioned and....
1133112112111214.title: Wish malfunction option 2 or 3?

choices: You're covered in fur. (You're in an anthro fur reality.)
Nothing extremely out of the ordinary. You just wet the diaper.
11331121121112143.content: When you had awoken, after remembering passing out at Disneyworld Magic Kingdom, you come to see your are back in your room laying in bed, staring at the ceiling at the moment. You pulled up your covers to see, that you are diapered once more. And not only that.
11331121121112143.title: Disneyworld didn't happen. But You're Diapered.

choices: Still your ten year old age.
You were younger, between 7 and 8 years.
You were younger. between 5 and 6 years.
You were younger. between 0 and 4 years.
113311211211121431.content: You couldn't believe it. You were covered in fur. You still moved and thought like your former human self, but you were now seeing fur all over your body. Your feet and hands had claws in place of nails.And you could feel it and see it. A fluffy tail wagging between your legs below your diaper you were wearing. From the fluff of the tail and the fur color, and the fact you could actually see your nose better, you deduced you were some form of canine. You wonder if it be wolf, coyote or husky possibly. You're diaper was a boy's diaper, and judging by your size you were......
113311211211121431.title: You're a Furry!!!

choices: "I wish my parents acted like this everyday."
1133112112112.content:
"Great," You think yourself. "I'm getting to visit my favorite Disney park while being dressed like a baby and being pushed around in a stroller."

Casey appeared to be throwing a greater fit than you had imagined. Even though she was a college student, she was dressed like a toddler and throwing a tantrum as like a tired kindergartner.

After six hours of being pushed around and three diaper changes, you were actually starting to enjoy your time in the park. You had not been allowed to ride any of the adult rides, but did enjoy meeting the princesses and riding the Frozen ride. Overall, it was quite enjoyable being pushed around the world.

At the end of the day you watched the fireworks before being pushed to the exit. You rode the monorail back to the TTC. once at the TTC your parents pushed you to the car. In didn't matter that you were being pushed in a stroller. Off in the distance, Tinkerbell flew away from the Magic Kingdom.

Your tired mind made a silent wish...
1133112112112.title: "Epcot," Your father answers.

choices: dressed like a girl and thought to be mommy and daddies' princess
you were a princess at a Disney Park
11331121121121.content:
You thought to yourself, I wish I was a princess. Then, you fell asleep. When you woke up, you realized something was different.

You realized you were....
11331121121121.title: "I wish I was a princess."

choices: a baby girl, mommy and daddies' princess
a teenage girl, mommy and daddies' princess
113311211211213.title: something else

113311211212.content:
You and Casey discussed the decision together in her room. After several hours of debate, you both decided that you did not want to be seen in public dressed as an infant and a toddler.

Your parents seemed happy about your decision and set about ordering the necessary equipment off of the internet. The equipment showed up Saturday morning and by noon your parents had the machine set up and running.

You sighed as you entered the machine. All of your teenage years melted away as you regressed back to babyhood. Once the transformation was complete, your mother removed you from the machine and carried you up to your room. You gasped in shock as your room had been transformed into a nursery. You bed and had morphed into a crib. Your desk had changed into a changing table. Your dresser had changed into a more infantile looking dresser.

Several minutes later, your mother had you diapered and dressed. She carried you downstairs and placed you inside of a swinging chair which began to rock you back and forth. You giggled as you looked up at your mother. It was clear that she was finding enjoyment in having a baby again.

Casey, on the other hand, was kicking and screaming. She did not want to be regressed to a toddler. Your father gave her a swift smack on the bottom which seemed to stun her into submission. Minutes later, Casey had been transformed into a four year-old. After Casey had been changed, your entire family came together in the living room.

You looked at your sister and then at your parents. Your father fiddled with some knobs on the machine. You tried to remember every knob that he touched so you could undo everything after they went to bed.

"Now, do my little angels want to go to the park, or to the circus?" Your mother asked, distracting you from watching your father. "I promise that we'll get ice cream afterwards."

You and Casey look at each other. Your plan of not having to go out in public was thwarted. At least now, you weren't a teenager dressed as a baby; you were a baby dressed as a baby.
113311211212.title: Stay home & modify reality

choices: Casey wakes you up to fix reality
1133112112121.content:
"No." Casey said as she stamped her foot and crossed her arms.

"I think the park sounds lovely," Your mother replied, ignoring Casey's pouting.

You soon found yourself being pushed around the park in a stroller. It was a quite nice experience, you were able to look around at all of the trees and scenery while Casey was being dragged along in a harness and leash. She would have been even more resistant to this trip, but a firm spanking beforehand had melted her into submission.

You sucked on the pacifier as your mother pushed you along. As the walk went on longer you felt a strange sensation. You couldn't quite put your finger on what was wrong, but you knew that something was off.

"Oh, it smells like we've got a little stinker," Your mother said as she checked your diaper.

You had messed yourself without realizing what you were doing. Tears welled up in your eyes as you began to cry. Your mother soothed you as she took you to the public restrooms. It did not take long for your mother to clean your messy diaper and place you in a dry, fresh diaper.

The walk continued onward until your parents were bored with the park. True to their word, they took you out for ice cream. Casey was still being fussy, but she actually seemed to enjoy getting ice cream. Your mother spoon fed you some ice cream, but you promptly made a mess.

The rest of the day was uneventful. Several diaper changes later, you had been bathed, fed and were being rocked to sleep. Maybe if Casey could come into your room after your parents went to bed then you could have an opportunity to reset the reality machine and return to normal.
1133112112121.title: Go to the park

11331121121211.content:
Casey sneaked into your room after your parents went to bed. You were struggling to stay awake. If she had been five minutes later you would have been asleep. She hoisted you out of your crib and placed you on the floor. You crawled behind her as she led you to the living room.

The machine looked daunting to your diminutive stature. Casey pushed a chair next to the machine and began to fiddle with the dials.

"Do you remember the dials?" Casey asked. "I don't think I remember what dad selected."

You and Casey step into the machine. A loud buzzing noise emits from the machine and you are hit with a bright beam of light.

Did the machine work properly?
11331121121211.title: Casey wakes you up to fix reality

113311211212112.content:
You look at your body. You are happy to see that your original body had returned, but disappointed to see that you are still dressed as a baby. Casey had grown back into her adult body but still donned her toddler pajamas. As you stepped out of the machine you spotted your parents entering the room.

They were not pleased at your late night adventures. Your mother picked you up and carried you to back to your nursery. She scolded you the entire way. In the living room you could hear Casey being spanked by your father. Her cries echoed through the hall.

Your mother placed you back in your crib before tucking you in. It was peculiar that she was able to lift you even though you were a teenager again. You didn't want to cause a commotion and be spanked like Casey. Your mother then turned out the lights and left you alone.

Gradually, your eyelids grew heavier. Soon you drifted off to sleep. In the morning you awoke to a wet a diaper. Your mother returned to your room and pulled you from your crib. She removed your pajamas and changed you into a dry diaper. Then, she dressed you in a blue onesie and carried you downstairs.

She placed you in the high chair as she set about preparing breakfast. Moments later Casey entered the room. She was wearing a purple skirt and a pink shirt with princesses. Her hair was pulled back in a pair of pigtails. It was clear that she was still pouting.

After breakfast your mother loaded you and Casey into the car. She pulled out of the car and began to drive down the road. Several minutes later she came to a stop in front of...
113311211212112.title: No

11331121122.content:
Your parents left for work in the morning and you were left alone with Casey. Around ten o'clock the doorbell rang. Casey raced to the front door and threw it open wide. Standing outside the door was a deliveryman with several boxes. After Casey signed for the packages the deliveryman left.

"All right sport," Casey began as she reached down and picked up the largest box, "Help me carry these boxes up to my room."

You ran over to help Casey. The two smaller boxes were easier to handle and you carried them both with no problems. After shutting the door behind you, you followed your sister to her room. Once inside, you found that Casey was already tearing into the large box. All of the baby items came pouring out the boxes. Within minutes, everything was unpacked.

Casey looked at you and laughed. "Are you ready to go through with this?"

You smiled back at your sister and nodded your head.

"Very well then," Casey said as she placed a pacifier in your mouth. "From this moment on, you're my baby. You are not allowed to talk back to me, and have to follow all of my instructions. Don't worry, we'll make sure that everything is cleaned up and hidden before mom and dad return from work."

You sucked on your pacifier and nodded in agreement.

"Now I think it's time we get baby dressed for the day," Casey began.

You started to lift your shirt before Casey gently slapped your hand away. Your eyes were filled with surprise and confusion until you realized that you were not going to be able to dress yourself. Casey helped lift your shirt up and over your head. Next, Casey helped remove your pants and underwear.

Casey spread out a changing pad on the floor and instructed you to lie down on top. You did as you were instructed and waited; it was an odd feeling lying naked on the floor in front of your sister. Casey began to rub powder onto your privates. When instructed, you lifted your body so Casey could slide a diaper underneath. Several seconds later, Casey had securely taped you into your very own diaper. You had not felt this content since that night you had your heart-to-heart talk with Casey.

Casey then chose the pair of shortalls and a t-shirt with a picture of dinosaurs. She pulled the t-shirt over your head before having you step into the shortalls. Once you were dressed, Casey handed you the teddy bear she had purchased and then marched you over to the full-length mirror.

Your pacifier hit the floor as you gasped loudly. Staring back at you from the mirror was a giant toddler. You looked almost exactly like a larger version of a pre-schooler.

"We've got several hours left so I'll let you make one more big boy decision," Casey said as she admired her work. "Do you want you to stay home and watch cartoons, or do you want to go play at the park? If you want to stay home then I'll buy you a Happy Meal from McDonald's; but if you want to go to the park then we'll stop for ice cream on the way home."

You think for a moment before replying...
11331121122.title: All goes according to Plan

choices: Casey forces you to go with her
Casey allows you to stay home
113311211221.content:
You decided that it would be better to stay at home than risk being seen in public. All morning long you watch cartoons and play with your stuffed animals. Your stomach rumbles as you get hungry. It is then that you decide to remind Casey about her promise.

"I can't leave my little, baby brother at home," Casey said as she began to lead you to the garage.

You began to panic. You had no idea that Casey still intended on dragging you into public.

"Don't worry, you'll sit in the backseat and nobody will see you," Casey reassured you.

You begged and pleaded to stay in the house. As much as you enjoyed being babied, you were not ready to be fully treated like a toddler.
113311211221.title: "Stay home."

choices: Casey was nowhere to be seen
Casey was still sitting on the bench
113311211222.content:
"I think I want to go to the park," You meekly reply.

You blush as Casey pops your pacifier back into your mouth. You begin to suck on the pacifier as Casey ruffles your hair.

"Alright squirt, I'll pack a diaper bag and we'll head out," Casey tells you.

You leave Casey's room and make your way down to the living room. Walking in a diaper was not as hard as you had expected; however, it did make you waddle. Casey soon joined you in the living room with a diaper bag full of supplies. You really hoped that you wouldn't need a diaper change while out in public.

Casey lead you to the garage and you got into the backseat of the car. Casey buckled you in before handing you back your teddy bear. As Casey drove along you hugged your teddy tightly and looked out the window. You felt a mix of excitement and fear. What would other people think of you, a giant toddler, playing in the park?

Once you arrived, Casey opened the door and unbuckled you. The two of you walked hand in hand down the path towards the playground. There were not many people at the park today. Several bikers raced past you and paid you no attention. You soon found yourself at the giant playground. Casey sat on a nearby bench while she encouraged you to explore the playground.

It was awkward trying to play on the equipment as you were taller than a normal toddler. You soon let go of your fears and began to play like a real toddler. An hour had passed. You were having fun playing in the sand, swinging on the swings, and going down the slide that you didn't realize that you had to go potty. As you were getting ready to go down the slide you felt your diaper grow warm. Your lip quivered as you realized that you were wetting yourself without even realizing.

After sliding down, you stood at the bottom of the slide you looked around for Casey.
113311211222.title: "Go to the park."

choices: Go to the parking lot to see if Casey is there
Stay seated on the bench waiting
1133112112221.content:
You began to panic as you realized that Casey was nowhere to be found. Even the diaper bag that she had brought with was missing. Your lip began to tremble and you fought to hold back tears. You waddled over to the bench where you had last seen Casey. You sat on the bench and waited for Casey to return. As you waited your wet diaper began to grow uncomfortable.

You didn't know how long it had been since you had arrived. Nor did you know how long you had been waiting for Casey. Maybe it was five minutes of waiting, maybe it was a half hour. You needed to make sure that you made it back home before your parents returned from work.

Casey may have gone back to the car. Maybe you should wander to the parking lot to see if her car is still there. On the other hand, staying in the place where Casey was last seen was probably a safer alternative.
1133112112221.title: Casey was nowhere to be seen

11331121122212.content:
You stayed seated on the bench and waited for Casey to return. You began to fidget as you waited. Finally, you stuck your thumb in your mouth and began to suck your thumb.

A woman pushing a stroller approached you. The stroller looked large enough to hold two people and was covered with a blanket. You became scared as she approached you and you found yourself wetting your already wet diaper.

"Hi there, little one," The woman said. "It looks like you're lost."

You pulled your thumb out of your mouth in order to reply. As soon as you began to reply the woman shoved a pacifier in your mouth. You tried to spit the pacifier out, but she clamped her hand over your mouth. You had no choice but to suck on the pacifier. The pacifier had a strange taste and you felt yourself growing sleepy.

The woman took your hand and led you to the stroller. She removed the blanket revealing Casey strapped into one of the seats. Casey had a pacifier in her mouth and looked unconscious. You tried to protest, but you were too weak and tired. The woman sat you next to Casey and buckled you in. You soon found your eyelids drooping and it became hard to stay awake.

The woman pushed you and Casey back to the parking lot. She loaded you both into her van and drove away. When you finally awoke, you found yourself...
11331121122212.title: Stay seated on the bench waiting

1133112112222.content:
You waddled towards Casey. She smiled as you approached. You sheepishly explained to your sister that you had wet your diaper. You also told her that you didn't remember needing to pee until it was too late.

"That's okay, champ," Casey said as she ruffled your hair. "We'll get you cleaned up and then go get ice cream."

Casey took you by the hand and led you to the restrooms. You breathed a sigh of relief as Casey took you to the large, assistance restroom. You wondered what people would think if she had changed your diaper in the women's restroom.

Casey laid the changing mat down on the floor of the restroom. You then laid down on top of the pad and followed Casey's instructions. She unbuttoned your short-alls and removed your wet diaper. Then, she wiped you down with a baby wipe. After she powdered you she taped you into a dry diaper and buttoned your short-alls.

Now that you were dry again you felt much better. Casey took your hand and led you back to the car. She helped you into the backseat and buckled your seat belt. You smiled as Casey handed you your stuffed bear. You should think of a good name for your bear.

As Casey pulled away from the parking lot she asked you a simple question. "Do you want to go inside the ice cream store, or would you rather we go through the drive-through?"

You think for a moment before replying...
1133112112222.title: Casey was still sitting on the bench

choices: "Stay a toddler for a little while longer."
11331121122221.content:
"Go inside." You replied as you hugged your bear.

Casey drove to the ice cream shop and parked. She opened the back door and helped you out. Taking your hand, she walked you inside. You had become emboldened by your trip to the park, but now that you were in an area with more people you began to feel self-conscious. Casey approached the counter and ordered herself a cone. She looked at you and you suddenly became quiet and shy; and you tried to hide behind Casey.

"He'll have a chocolate cone," Casey said to the girl behind the counter.

After Casey paid she handed you your cone and the two of you sat at a table. You quietly ate your ice cream. You glanced around at the other customers and workers. Aside from your clothes looking childish, nobody would be able to tell that you were acting like a toddler. Your lapse in concentration caused you to smear chocolate ice cream over your face.

Casey laughed as she took a napkin and wiped the side of your mouth. You grinned sheepishly.

"Oh, he's so adorable!" One of the workers said as she approached your table. "Are you babysitting your little brother today?"

"Yes, I am," Casey replied.

You blushed as the girl talked to Casey. You weren't sure if she was being serious, if her coworkers dared her to approach you, or if she was teasing you. You ate your ice cream as you listened. Your face grew red as you blushed.

"Is he wearing a diaper? It would be a shame if he weren't and had an accident." The girl laughed. "Here's my phone number. Call me if you ever need someone to help babysit."

Casey took the girl's phone number. After finishing your ice cream you left the store and returned home. During the drive you continued to hug your bear.

Upon returning, Casey looked at her watch. There were still several hours before your parents would return home from work.

"All right squirt," Casey began, "Do you want to continue being a toddler, or do you want to grow back up to a big boy?"

She was wearing a corduroy dress that came down to her knees and a pair of tights. Underneath her dress she wore a long sleeved rainbow shirt. She runs her finger along the waist of the diaper and locates the edge of the tape, which you had not been able to do, and is able to carefully undo it. "I want you to go get cleaned up in the bathroom and throw this away," she says swiftly but not unkindly, handing you a plastic bag "put it into this, and once you toss it, I want you to go to your room and wait for me to talk with Dad," she tells you and then adds hastily "You're not being punished, and you're not going to be, but I want to talk with him before we do anything else"

With that reassurance she leads you to the bathroom and shuts you in before walking away. You take off the diaper, careful not to get any of the mess on the tile, and clean yourself up. You tape the diaper into a ball and put into the bag, twisting the handles together and tying them in a knot to seal in the smell. Pulling your sweat pants back up you cross to your room and shut the door before sitting down on your bed. You sit there tense, as the light from the window begins to fade as it comes on evening, and still your parents have not come up. You lay down and begin to doze off, emotionally drained and physically exhausted you fall asleep, your thumb finding its way unconsciously to your mouth.

...{A couple of Hours later}...

You jolt awake as you Mom gently shakes your shoulder before turning on the light. She and your Dad come in and sit-down on either side of you. "Your Dad and I talked, and did a little research. And we decided that we are going to support you. We want you to know that we love you, and we may not entirely understand this, but we want you to do whatever makes you feel more comfortable, which is why we got you these," you mother explains indicating the bags she left by your door. "Now whether or not you use them is up to you, but if you want to you can, and if you want some help we can diaper you too if you want. Now you may not want to use everything we got for you and that's okay too, but if there is anything else you want, you just need to let us know. We don't think you need to keep something like this a secret from us, and we definitely don't want you to feel ashamed of something like this" your mother finishes kindly, patting you on the shoulder. "Are you going to look at what we got you?" she asks politely, and you walk over dreamily.

Your parents just said that they would support your wearing diapers, and even change you if you wanted them to. You open the largest bag, and as you expected it contains a case of diapers. You look at the number and blink, "80?" you say to yourself. "Well, they are disposable after all, and depending on how often you want to use it, that may not last long." your mother informs you. You move on to the next bag and find changing supplies and a fold-away changing matt for someone your size, the third bag contains the strangest thing yet. Inside it are a pacifier, baby bottle, and a blue onesie, yet they are all sized to fit a teen or adult over a baby.

"After you told us about John, your father and I visited John's mother, and she explained some things. She told us that it wasn't that John needed diapers, but rather that he chose to wear them. And that he also likes to be babied. She figured that if you also wanted to wear diapers that you might like to be babied too. So she gave us some of John's things and told us where we could get more for you if you want... Do you?" your mother explained, with an almost hopeful tone to her voice in her last question

You couldn't believe it. In the course of one short day you'd gotten trapped in a diaper, used it, been comforted by your mother and now your parents were asking to baby you. And a part of you inexplicably longed for it. You already knew that you wanted to keep wearing diapers, but did you want to go the whole hog and let your parents baby you too?

1142311.content:
You took a long look at your mother   as she respectfully awaited patiently for your decision. Did you really want your lifestyle to change all because of an accident? You had to admit, it was embarrassing, but exciting at the same time. If your parents were willing to support you...then maybe...

You gulped, feeling your mouth dry up. While you didn't think about your own mother in such a perverted manner, you did have to admit she had some unbelievable curves. You had some ideas on how much you wanted to be babied and spoiled, but while your parents were their to support you, how far would they be willing to go?

Fidgeting, you thought a bit as your wondered how to begin. "Um...I think I would like that...but...how far are you guys willing to support me?"

Seeing that you had doubts, your mother smiled and leaned forward to grab your hand, squeezing it tightly. "Sweetie, we'll support you in whatever way that makes you comfortable."

Her words allowed some reassurance, but now, it was time to be honest. The amount of maternal love and warmth your mother was emanating made it hard to ignore or dismiss her presence as easily as it was before you ever got caught in diapers. She was a strict, but loving mother who knew how to accommodate and negotiate. Due to this, she had as much control over the house as your father. She definitely persuaded your father in some manner to also show his support for this crazy idea.

"Then..." you hesitated, almost worried she would think of you as foul and perverted. Considering they were willing to baby you even though you were a teenager, it wasn't out of the question your parents would go along with it.

"...can you start...breastfeeding me?"

Your voice lowered as you got to your final intention, but your mother could definitely hear it. She blinked a few times before finally giving another reassuring smile.

"Well, if that is what you want, sweetheart. I can't lactate, but...John's mother does have a doctor she knows and trust that they visit. I am sure that this doctor can maybe help me start lactating again. I will set an appointment, okay?"

You breathed a heavy sigh as a huge weight was lifted from your shoulder. You feared her reaction, but she took it extremely well. Nodding, you couldn't believe that your mother was going to try breastfeeding you again. Heck, even if she couldn't lactate, you still wanted to suck on her large breasts. Was it perverted in nature? Absolutely. You were still a teenager after all, but being a baby did have its benefits. You planned on milking those benefits as much as possible given your parents support.

Seeing that you were relieved, your mother gave a light chuckle and moved forward to hug you. Hugging you tightly as she rubbed your back reassuringly.

You forbid yourself from crying and instead held your breath, leaning down to hug her back. Her breasts jiggled pleasantly against your chest causing you to groan. You couldn't stop thinking about your mother's breasts now that plans were in motion to start breastfeeding you.

As she pulled back, your mother kissed you on the cheek and then caressed it gently. "Oh baby, I have to admit, I'm overjoyed. I know this is unusual, but John and his mother seemed very close and comfortable. I'm convinced that this will help us as a family and bring us even closer. Now then, let's go and sit in the living room, I've gathered your father and sister so we can make things official."

Your mother blinked before she forgot. "Oh! Do you want me to change you into your new diaper...or should we wait?"

11432121.content:
"So, honey, I have to ask. Do you like wearing diapers. Understand our family will be 100% supportive if you do," she said.

You blushed, and scratched your neck. You had to admit, this situation was odd, but the more you thought about it, the more you were realizing, this was something you liked. the diapers were comfy, and while you were embarrassed to have pooped in a diaper in front of your mom a moment ago, you had to admit that the squishy feeling wasn't all that bad. You then thought of some perks you got from wearing diapers, should you be watching a movie, playing a video game, or even doing homework, you wouldn't have to worry about getting up to use the potty, since you had portable potty attached to your bottom.

"Well, I kind of do," you told her.

"I thought that might be the case sweetie, and it's natural. I've read about a lot of kids your age who are into this kind of thing. Some more then others. Now, how far do you wanna immerse yourself into this thing sweetie?" Your mom asked.

"Huh? I don't understand. What do you mean?" you asked in return.

Well, there are three ways you can go about this. You can decide to just wear the diapers whenever you want, and pretty much go on with your normal routine. Not much would change, well, aside from the fact you'll need a change. Then, there's the option of being an adult baby. Some kids your age, want to act like they were in their early years, like when you were four still running around in diapers. We can have a adult sized nursery set up for you, with all the things essential for being what the call an adult baby, or teenage baby as stated by some, which you would be. But know if we go that route, there will be restrictions to what you can do.

For starters, and I think this part you would like. You wouldn't be going to school anymore, since "babies" aren't old enough to attend school. If we let you play video games, there can be no violence, like the game Call of Duty a lot your age like to play. And this also breaths true for movies and TV. You can only watch PG or G rated films and shows, and I will make sure the proper parental settings are set up when I get the tv put into the nursery. If you need to be changed, you can't change yourself, and have to call upon the grownups of the house to help you. You can't sleep in a regular bed, so you will have to sleep in a crib we will set up. No dating is to be involved, and your friend John will have to be temporarily babied like you should he decide to come visit you. We will also have to hire new babysitters, should your siblings not be around to take care of you.

In matters of eating, well, I'll give you three options, which we can talk about later should we decide to go the Teenage Baby route. Again this up to you how far you wanna go with this," She finished.

"And what's the third option?" You ask with some peaked curiosity.

You were highly considering option 2 since no school already had you sold, but you had to hear the third option. Your mother then asked, "Are you sure you want to hear it? The third option may be too odd for you sweetie."

Well, this whole day had been odd. Here your mom was willing to baby you again. You're not sure how many mothers would do that for their kids. And she was willing to go all in with this teenage baby gig. So if this third option was more odd then that, it all the more peaked your curiosity, so you answered, "I'm sure."

"Well, the third option is to make you a little toddler again. You would be back to the age of 4, or even younger should you choose. 4 would be the maximum age I'd let you be," Your mom said.

"Wait, make me the age of 4? How would you do that?" You asked confused.

"Well, there's a very special thing all women, like your sister and myself, are only capable of. It's what's known as unbirth. I would basically out you back in my tummy, in the place you were conceived, called my womb. There an umbilical chord would attach, and start to reverse your age in my tummy. Once you've become your appropriate age you want, I'd let you back out again. And it would also give me back my own motherly youth to take care of you, and I can do it again and again, should you wish to stay whatever toddler age you want. And again, we would have things set up much like the teenage baby route, with a few more restirctions and perks as well. So it's up to you honey.

Not many mothers go this third route, since one, they usually want to see their little ones grow and take on their own lives, and also because their children did not want to return to a childs age.

Now that we have that out of the way, it's up to you to decide sweetie You can just wear diapers and go on as a normal teenage boy, just, wearing diapers, or we can make you a Teenage Baby, or Mommy can put you back in her tummy and make you her little toddler again," She finished.

After hearing these lists of options you thought long and hard about what you wanted to do, then you finally answered....

"Well, of course you'd have many of the same restrictions as the teenage baby route, but other things come into play. We just recently learned about a place called Age Regression Daycare, Or A.R. Daycare for short. That's where your daddy and I would take you if we can't stay at home for you? Many who go the route of option 3 go to that place, and from what I hear, they have the time of their new lives.

Other things that would be in play is no sleepovers with anyone older then your own age group, so they have to be 4 years old like you. As far as eating goes, well, it's the same as if you were a teenage baby. You can have diced foods, mashed foods, or, and this may feel odd, you can breastfeed from me. Be aware the younger we go, eventually it will boil down to you breastfeeding from me, if your say a year or younger, and I don't believe in that nasty formula with all those things they put in it. 2 to 3 would be mashed foods. 3 to 4 will be able to give you the option of diced foods, like hot dogs, veggies and fruits. Teenage baby will be all three options open as well," Your mom said.

Well, that put things into perspective a bit. "Anything else?" You ask.

"Well, you will have to wear what children normally wear in the age group you choose. Of course again, you must ask for a change, even if you think you'd be old enough to change yourself. No video games not meant for ones over the age of 4. Naptimes will be when I say they are. No negotiations. Bedtime will be no later then 8:30 at night. Pacifiers will be a must in public. I understand it sounds embarrassing, but most people find it cute at the ages between 0-4 years. I'll let you decide if you want to use it at home.

There are only three places you can take naps and go to bed in. Your new crib we will get you. In our room, with me and dad, or, in my tummy. And don't worry, if you nap in there, it won't regress you further unless you want to. No naps or bed on the living room couches.

Another thing that you can't do, and you may have the urge, cause trust me, you did before when you were that little, you won't be able to do any chores.

Daddy's private study room will be off limits. If we hire a babysitter, or have one your siblings watch you, we will make sure they treat you with respect, but they will be in charge.

Also, another thing to mention about A.R. Daycare, we will talk to them about what to feed you so that they don't go across a line you don't want in orders of eating. If you nap at their daycare, only their tummies or the cribs will be your napping place. And yes, they know of the practice of unbirthing.

Oh, and one last thing. If I decide I want to, you have to allow me to pick you up and hold you. You were rather a bit of a clinger when you were that age," Your mom said.

You were amazed that your mom was being so descriptive about what would happen with both being a teenage baby, and being an actual toddler/baby. Both options really sounded tempting. Both got you out of school, both gave you a portable potty to get changed from, and both made a closer bond with your family. So the idea did send temptation to your mind to have her milk again. There were some other perks she mentioned about becoming a toddler, as well as some more restrictions, while your were thinking things over.

Eventually you decided.
